DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the role of musculoskeletal ultrasound and power Doppler in early therapy monitoring of rheumatoid arthritis patients.
DOC.brief_title: Role of Greyscale and Power Doppler Sonography in Therapy Monitoring in Early Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA)
DOC.criteria: Adults: age at disease onset >18 years and < 50 years Disease duration < 3 month Fulfilling ARA criteria for classification of RA DMARD naive Age at diagnosis < 18 years Disease duration > 3 month Previous use of DMARDS Previous use of biologics
